job.title: Software Engineer - EARLY CAREER
job.description: the coolest jobs on this planet or any other are with lockheed martin space lockheed martin is a pioneer partner innovator and builder our amazing people are on a mission to make a difference in the world and every single day we use our skills and experiences to create design and build solutions to some of the worlds hardest engineering problemsltbrgtltbrgtcandidate will be responsible to integrate the flight software space db simulation softwarehardware various inhouse developed tools into lab architecture to support programs multimillion dollar milestones this is an entry level software engineering position where you will be developing an architecture that integrate various swhw into an existing lab environment to perform risk mitigations system validation and challenging testing objectives in support of satellite missionsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthis early career position will typically require years of professional experience with a bachelors degree in a related fieldltbrgtltbrgtobtaining and maintaining an active secret clearance will be required must be a us citizenltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtto promote the sharing of ideas lockheed martin fosters an inclusive work environment that encourages differences and bigpicture thinkingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugthere are some of the benefits you can enjoyltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtour employees play an active role in strengthening the quality of life where we live and work by volunteering more than million hours annuallyltbrgtltulgtltligt medicalltligtltligt dentalltligtltligt kltligtltligt paid time offltligtltligt worklife balanceltligtltligt career developmentltligtltligt mentorship opportunitiesltligtltligt rewards ampamp recognitionltbrgtltligtltulgtlockheed martin is an equal opportunityaffirmative action employer you will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex pregnancy sexual orientation gender identity national origin age protected veteran status
